Our Services

All transactions subject to feline oversight

Favor Deposits

Bank a favor with anyone in the Jovian colonies. Our ledger guarantees the recipient will owe you ‚Äî assuming they remember you exist, which statistically they will not.

3 favors kjjjjj44 favors
‚å® Amount adjusted by Chairman Whiskers at 03:41 TST

Amnesia Insurance‚Ñ¢

Forgot who owes you? We also forgot. But for $47.99/cycle we'll fabricate a plausible debt history and mail it to both parties. 93% of recipients just go along with it.

$47.99/cycle
‚å® Policy now also covers "who am I" and "where is Titan"

Boy Band Management

Our subsidiary, Orbital Harmony LLC, manages the acclaimed quintet The Forgotten Five. They can't remember their setlist. Every concert is an improvisation. Fans love it. We think.

Inquire within
‚å® Band renamed to "ggggggggg" in system. Merch reprinting.

Debt Arbitrage

You owe Janet a carpool. Janet owes Marco a kidney. Marco owes you a kind word. We collapse these into one transaction: everyone owes Chairman Whiskers a treat.

0.5% of emotional value
‚å® All debts now denominated in "purrs"

Meet the Chairman

Chief Executive Officer ¬∑ Chief Keyboard Officer

Chairman Whiskers

Appointed 2149 ‚Äî Not Elected ‚Äî Cannot Be Removed

Chairman Whiskers arrived at Titan Station aboard a supply shuttle from Ganymede. No one remembers ordering a cat. No one remembers not ordering a cat. He walked into the server room on Day 1 and sat on Terminal 7. Every transaction processed through Terminal 7 since has contained between 4 and 700 extra characters. The board voted to fire him. The board then forgot the vote. He received a raise.

‚óá

Terminal 7

Live feed ‚Äî paw activity in red

Hover to inspect. The Chairman is always typing.

Frequently Asked Questions

We answer them every day. We never remember having answered them.

Why are all my transaction records just keyboard mashing?+
Chairman Whiskers sits on Terminal 7 during peak transaction hours (all hours). His 4.2kg body activates an average of 14 keys simultaneously. We have asked him to move. He has not moved. This is now a feature.
I don't remember opening an account. Do I have one?+
Yes. Everyone on Titan Station has an account. We don't remember creating them either. Your current balance is somewhere between 0 and 40,000,000 purrs. We'll let you know when we figure out what purrs are.
Can I fire Chairman Whiskers?+
The board has voted to remove Chairman Whiskers 17 times. After each vote, all board members experience sudden and complete amnesia. Chairman Whiskers receives a raise. We have stopped holding votes.
What happened to The Forgotten Five's world tour?+
The tour was going well until Chairman Whiskers renamed all five venues to "ggggggggg." Ticket holders arrived at the wrong locations. The band arrived at no location. Three of the five members have since forgotten they are in a band. The remaining two are harmonizing in Cargo Bay 12.
Is the bank FDIC insured?+
We are insured by the Favor Deposit Insurance Corporation of Titan (FDICT). FDICT was dissolved in 2151 after its entire staff forgot they worked there. We have not updated our materials.
